text: Sergo Karapetyan (; 6 August 1948 â€“ 18 February 2021) was an Armenian politician. He was Agriculture Minister between 2010 and 2016.PM congratulates Agriculture Minister on birthday, ARMENPRESSKarapetyan Sergo , ANAU On 18 February 2021, Karapetyan died from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Armenia at a hospital in Yerevan, aged 72. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Armenian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Armenia Category:21st-century Armenian people
title: Sergo Karapetyan
